text: Porphyrobacter donghaensis is a Gram-negative, non-spore-forming, slightly halophilic and motile bacteria from the genus of Porphyrobacter which has been isolated from the Sea of Japan (East Sea) in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Porphyrobacter donghaensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2004
title: Porphyrobacter donghaensis
